entry.title: my holidays only come in hard mode
entry.summary:
Author: almostnowandthen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,397Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Dick gifts Jason a sexy stocking set for Christmas. Of course, the real recipient of this particular gift is Dick Grayson himself. So when Dick asks Jason to put it on, and Jason points out that there are, in fact, three weeks still to go until Christmas, the only response he gets is the response he should have expected all along: “You didn’t expect me to wait, did you?” (A fic about stockings, having sex in emotionally loaded places, and attempts at roleplaying while grappling with said emotions.)

entry.title: What It Sounds Like
entry.summary:
Author: UltraCaffeinatedIvy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,424Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Things are mostly looking up for Jason Todd. He’s finally earned a scholarship to Gotham Academy and has a place that actually feels like home. He knows it's not some kind of cosmic reward for getting through a rough past, living through Catherine's addictions, his dad up and disappearing, or any of the other shit he's had to put up with. You get dealt your hand in life, for better or —more likley— worse, and try to make the best of it. Then Dick Grayson steps in. Or Where Pamela Isley adopts Jason Todd. Enrolls him in Gotham Academy and Jason struggles being a normal teenager, having friends and, of course, falls in love with Dick Grayson in the process. A coming of age story.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 181,379Chapters: 38/53Kudos: 1,383

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: The Inheritance
entry.summary:
Author: HopelesslyObsessed

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,944Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 75

Summary: They had an agreement that for Jason's sake, she'd keep her distance. But when he dies a few weeks short of his sixteenth birthday, it becomes her biggest regret. So, what if he'd had a crush on her? If only she'd been there, maybe things wouldn't have ended so tragically. She shouldn't have ever set foot in Gotham again, but Bruce was going down a dark path, and they both needed Joker to pay for what he did. The clown remains elusive, and she can't deny that Bruce's violence is rubbing off on her. When they finally catch him, things don't end well for any of them, and she's driven further than Bludhaven in search of herself. It starts as a cover, a cathartic act to help her work through her emotions, but her pain runs deeper, and the only relief she finds is in another young mercenary, who has almost as much as her to hide, and a similar taste in red.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,077Chapters: 7/8Kudos: 131

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,969Chapters: 13/27Kudos: 269

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,445Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 154

Summary: Everyone has a soulmate, has a name that appears on their wrist sometime after they become an adult. But not everyone gets the privilege of actually being with their soulmate. Dick is one of those people. Because Dick's soulmate is unobtainable, dead before Dick received his name and pushed aside by Dick before that. And Dick has not forgiven himself since. Has not let himself forget everything he did wrong for the boy he was supposed to cherish, as both a brother and a soulmate. But then, everything changes when Dick is called into Gotham for a case. Suddenly, he's confronted with his own emotions: his loneliness in Bludhaven, his grief for his soulmate, his feelings for Gotham's newest crime lord… Wait, what was that last one?

entry.title: Livin' On A Prayer
entry.summary:
Author: arakhnoidsilk

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,548Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 82

Summary: "Jason Todd and Richard Grayson are, as they said previously, vigilantes. Like Spider-Man, they keep the city safe and, from what we have gathered in the last two months, only one of them has access to magic or has enhanced abilities, which is Jason Todd. Again, as mentioned by Grayson before, Todd was the one who came into contact with our already known symbiote Venom, a high-risk subject if not handled properly."Spider-Man added some details on the handling of the symbiote, which read, and I quote: 'Unnaturally quick to bond with the host, responsive but strangely docile compared to my experience with the alien. Seems like the symbiote and the host have a proper balance in their presence, and it looks like Red Hood doesn't break a sweat in controlling when the alien is presenting outside his body.' End quote."Some eyes in the room widened in surprise while Jason felt a snort escaping him.'Doesn't break a sweat,' my ass.
